mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.title, CONVERT(c.price,DECIMAL(8,2)) AS price, c.cover, cd.description, t.name teacherName, s1.title levelOne, s2.title levelTwo FROM edu_course c LEFT OUTER JOIN edu_course_description cd ON c.id = cd.id LEFT OUTER JOIN edu_teacher t ON c.teacher_id = t.id LEFT OUTER JOIN edu_subject s1 ON c.subject_parent_id = s1.id LEFT OUTER JOIN edu_subject s2 ON c.subject_id = s2.id WHERE c.id = #{courseId}
